desc: From concept to completion Design Chic creates inspiring bespoke interiors that are creative, timeless and practical. Specialises in small commercial and residential properties: new builds, renovations, apartments and bach's. Every space is a stage, we work in collaboration with our clients budgets, needs and desires.

layout.text: Browse our beautiful selection of homewares, rugs, furniture, art and gifts for the home. Designed for your everyday life
